data.enText: change to opposite

data.chText: 颠倒；彻底转变；使完全相反
data.enText: to change sth completely so that it is the opposite of what it was before

data.chText: 彻底改变程序 / 过程 / 趋势
data.enText: to reverse a procedure/process/trend

data.chText: 政府未能扭转经济滑坡的趋势。
data.enText: The government has failed to reverse the economic decline.

data.chText: 有时可以阻止病情发展或使病情彻底好转。
data.enText: It is sometimes possible to arrest or reverse the disease.
to change a previous decision, law, etc. to the opposite one

data.chText: 上诉法庭撤销了这项裁决。
data.enText: The Court of Appeal reversed the decision.
to turn sth the opposite way around or change the order of sth around
Writing is reversed in a mirror.

data.chText: 你该把这几页的顺序颠倒过来。
data.enText: You should reverse the order of these pages.
exchange two things
to exchange the positions or functions of two things

data.chText: 感觉就像我们父母和孩子交换了角色。
data.enText: It felt as if we had reversed our roles of parent and child.

data.chText: 过去她为我工作，而现在我们的地位对调了。
data.enText: She used to work for me, but our situations are now reversed.
yourself
to admit you were wrong or to stop having a particular position in an argument

data.chText: 他已经不再坚持自己在一系列问题上的立场。
data.enText: He has reversed himself on a dozen issues.
vehicle
when a vehicle or its driver reverses or the driver reverses a vehicle, the vehicle goes backwards
Now reverse the car.
He reversed around the corner.

data.chText: 她将车倒着开进停车位。
data.enText: She reversed into a parking space.
Caution! This truck is reversing.
telephone call
to make a telephone call that will be paid for by the person you are calling, not by you

data.chText: 劳驾，我想打一个由受话人付费的电话。
data.enText: I want to reverse the charges, please.
opposite
the opposite of what has just been mentioned

data.chText: 这个问题和上一个问题相反。
data.enText: This problem is the reverse of the previous one.

data.chText: 尽管我原以为会喜欢乡村生活，但实际情况正好相反。
data.enText: Although I expected to enjoy living in the country, in fact the reverse is true .
In the south, the reverse applies.

data.chText: 说服她过来不容易——实在太难了。
data.enText: It wasn't easy to persuade her to come─ quite the reverse .
back
the back of a coin, piece of material, piece of paper, etc.
in vehicle
reverse gear
the machinery in a vehicle used to make it move backwards
Put the car in/into reverse .
loss/defeat
a loss or defeat; a change from success to failure

data.chText: 房地产价值再次遭受损失。
data.enText: Property values have suffered another reverse.

data.chText: 具有破坏性的政治倒退
data.enText: a damaging political reverse
in reverse
in the opposite order or way

data.chText: 这个密码是我的电话号码的逆序排列。
data.enText: The secret number is my phone number in reverse.

data.chText: 我们走了和你相似的旅程，但方向相反。
data.enText: We did a similar trip to you, but in reverse.
go/put sth into reverse
to start to happen or to make sth happen in the opposite way
In 2002 economic growth went into reverse.
opposite
opposite to what has been mentioned
to travel in the reverse direction

data.chText: 获胜者是按逆序宣布的。
data.enText: The winners were announced in reverse order (= the person in the lowest place was announced first) .

data.chText: 实验的结果与原来的意图相反。
data.enText: The experiment had the reverse effect to what was intended.
back
opposite to the front
Iron the garment on the reverse side.

simple_means.memory_skill: re 相反；反对；不 + vers 转 + e → 反转的，颠倒的

data.enText: in reverse
in the opposite order or way

data.chText: 这个密码是我的电话号码的逆序排列。
data.enText: The secret number is my phone number in reverse.

data.chText: 我们走了和你相似的旅程，但方向相反。
data.enText: We did a similar trip to you, but in reverse.
go/put sth into reverse
to start to happen or to make sth happen in the opposite way
In 2002 economic growth went into reverse.

tr: (American football) a running play in which a back running in one direction hands the ball to a back running in the opposite direction
the gears by which the motion of a machine can be reversed
the side of a coin or medal that does not bear the principal design
an unfortunate happening that hinders or impedes
something that is thwarting or frustrating

example: we thought Sue was older than Bill but just the reverse was true
public opinion turned when it was revealed that the president had an affair with a White House intern

tr: turn inside out or upside down
reverse the position, order, relation, or condition of
example: when forming a question, invert the subject and the verb
The Republicans were overruled when the House voted on the bill
He revoked the ban on smoking

tr: reversed (turned backward) in order or nature or effect
directed or moving toward the rear
of the transmission gear causing backward movement in a motor vehicle

value.def: When someone or something reverses a decision, policy, or trend, they change it to the opposite decision, policy, or trend.

example.ex: They have made it clear they will not reverse the decision to increase prices...
example.tran: 他们已经明确表示不会更改提价的决定。

example.ex: The rise, the first in 10 months, reversed the downward trend in Belgium's jobless rate.
example.tran: 10个月来失业率的首次上升逆转了比利时失业率持续下降的趋势。

value.tran: 逆转，彻底改变（决定、政策、趋势等）

value.def: If you reverse the order of a set of things, you arrange them in the opposite order, so that the first thing comes last.

example.ex: In the squares place a penny, nickel, dime and quarter in that order. The object is to reverse the order of these coins...
example.tran: 在这些方块中按顺序放置1分、5分、10分和25分的硬币各一枚。目标是颠倒这些硬币的顺序。

example.ex: The normal word order is reversed in passive sentences.
example.tran: 正常词序在被动句中是颠倒的。

value.def: If you reverse the positions or functions of two things, you change them so that each thing has the position or function that the other one had.

example.ex: He reversed the position of the two stamps.
example.tran: 他将两枚邮票的位置调换了一下。

value.def: When a car reverses or when you reverse it, the car is driven backwards.

example.ex: Another car reversed out of the drive...
He reversed his car straight at the policeman.

value.boxr_value: in AM, usually use 美国英语通常用back up

value.def: If your car is in reverse, you have changed gear so that you can drive it backwards.

example.ex: He lurched the car in reverse along the ruts to the access road.
example.tran: 他顺着车辙摇摇晃晃地将车倒到了支路上。

value.def: Reverse means opposite to what you expect or to what has just been described.

example.ex: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
example.tran: 错误的态度会产生完全相反的效果。

value.def: If you say that one thing is the reverse of another, you are emphasizing that the first thing is the complete opposite of the second thing.

example.ex: There is absolutely no evidence at all that spectators want longer cricket matches. Quite the reverse...
example.tran: 完全没有证据表明观众想看时间更长的板球比赛。情况恰恰相反。

example.ex: This would lead one to expect a fat, dense and detailed autobiography. The reverse is true. The book is short and spare.
example.tran: 这会让人以为是一本内容晦涩而详尽的大部头自传。但正好相反，这本书简短明了。

value.def: A reverse is a serious failure or defeat.

example.ex: It's clear that the party of the former Prime Minister has suffered a major reverse.
example.tran: 显然，前首相所在党派遭受了重大的挫折。

value.def: The reverse or the reverse side of a flat object which has two sides is the less important or the other side.

example.ex: Cheques should be made payable to Country Living and your address written on the reverse.
example.tran: 支票抬头必须写“《乡村生活》杂志”，你的地址应写在背面。

value.def: If something happens in reverse or goes into reverse, things happen in the opposite way to what usually happens or to what has been happening.

example.ex: Amis tells the story in reverse, from the moment the man dies...
example.tran: 埃米斯以倒叙的方式讲述了这个故事，从这个男人死去的时候开始讲起。

example.ex: The downward trend went into reverse and the scores started to creep up again.
example.tran: 比分下降的趋势发生逆转，分数又开始逐渐上升了。

value.def: If you reverse the charges when you make a telephone call, the person who you are phoning pays the cost of the call and not you.

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 call collect

trans: 对方付费电话;受话人付费电话
逆向工程，倒序制造(研究另一家公司产品的制造后加以仿制)

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + vers 转 + ary 表人 → 逆反之人 → 对手
ad 做… + vers 转 + e → 一再转 → 逆反的
anni 年 + vers 转 + ary 物 → 一年转一次 → 周年纪念日
a 不 + vers 转 + e →〔反对〕不转 → 反对的
a 不 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 反感
a 加强 + vert 转 → 不停转 → 避开
contro 相反 + vert 转 → 反着转 → 反驳
con 共同 + vers 转 + ant …的 → 在一起转的 → 亲近的
con 共同 + vers 转 + e →〔两个齿轮对着〕一起转 → 相反的
con 共同 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 转化；（宗教的）改变
con 加强 + vert 转 → 转化
di 分开 + vers 转 + e → 转开了 → 不同的
di 分开 + vers 转 + ify 使… → 多样化
di 分开 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 转向；娱乐
di 分开 + vert 转 → 转开 → 使转向
in 不 + controvert 反驳 + ible …的 → 不容反驳的 → 不容争论的
in 不 + convert 转化 + ible 可…的，能…的；具有…性质的 → 不能转化的
in 进入 + vers 转 + e → 转进去 → 翻转的
mal 坏 + vers 转 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 转坏了 → 做官变坏 → 贪污
per 自始至终 + vers 转 + e → 自始至终〔反着〕转 → 性情乖张的
per 自始至终 + vert 转 → 自始至终地转 → 颠倒
re 相反 + vers 转 + e → 反着转 → 颠倒
re 回 + vert 转 → 转回来 → 恢复原状
re 回 + vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 恢复原状
trans 横过 + vers 转 + al …的 → 横着转 → 横断的
uni 一个 + vers 转 + e → 统一旋转 → 宇宙
uni 一个 + vers 转 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 由宇宙引申为知识，知识之地 → 大学
vers 转 + atile → 玩得转 → 多才的
vers 转 + e 婉转的话 → 诗歌
vers 转 + ion 表名词 → 从原文转换过来 → 译文
vert 转 + igo → 转着走 → 眩晕
re 回；向后 + bound 跳跃 → 回弹
re 回；向后 + call 想起 → 回忆
re 回；向后 + claim 要求 → 要求拿回 → 取回
re 回；向后 + flect 弯曲 →〔光线〕向回弯曲 → 反射
re 回；向后 + gress 走 → 倒退
re 回；向后 + juven 年轻 + ate 做，造成，使… → 回到年轻状态 → 返老还童
re 回；向后 + pel 推 → 驱除；击退
re 回；向后 + son 声音 + ant …的 → 回声的 → 回响的
re 回；向后 + tract 拉 → 拉回 → 缩回
re 回；向后 + turn 转动 → 向后转 → 返回
re 相反；反对；不 + action 行动 → 反动；反应
re 相反；反对；不 + bel 战斗 → 反过来打〔自己人〕→ 反叛
re 相反；反对；不 + move 移动 → 往反方向移动 → 移开
re 相反；反对；不 + neg 否认 + ade 表人 → 反过来否认〔自己人〕的人 → 叛徒
re 相反；反对；不 + peal 呼吁 → 不呼吁 → 取消
re 相反；反对；不 + prob 正直 + ate 表人 → 不正直的人 → 堕落者
re 相反；反对；不 + sent 感觉 → 反感 → 不满
re 相反；反对；不 + sist 站 → 反抗，抵抗
re 相反；反对；不 + vers 转 + e → 反转的，颠倒的
re 相反；反对；不 + volt 转 → 反转过来〔对抗自己人〕→ 反叛
re 一再，重新 + appear 出现 → 再出现
re 一再，重新 + arrange 安排 → 重新安排
re 一再，重新 + assure 放心 → 一再让人放心 → 消除（某人）疑虑
re 一再，重新 + birth 出生 → 再生，新生
re 一再，重新 + commend 赞扬 → 一再赞扬 → 推荐
re 一再，重新 + compense 补偿 → 一再补偿 → 赔偿
re 一再，重新 + examination 考试 → 复试
re 一再，重新 + furbish 磨光，擦亮 → 再磨光
re 一再，重新 + gener 产生 + ate 使… → 重新产生〔自我〕→ 改过自新的
re 一再，重新 + number 编号码 → 重新编号
re 一再，重新 + print 出版 → 再版
re 一再，重新 + production 生产 → 再生产
re 一再，重新 + surg 升起 + ence 表行为 → 重新升起 → 复兴
